title: Bloomberg Markets: BNEF's Morsy on Future of Electric Cars
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: BNEF's Morsy on Future of Electric Cars
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Salim Morsy Advanced Transport Analyst Bloomberg New Energy Finance (BNEF) Discussing BNEF forecast that electric cars will be as cheap as gasoline models by 2025, and will be dominating by 2040.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
